parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Sorting order of the tasks. Possible values are 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'project', 'creator', 'deadline_time', 'priority', 'status' and 'title'.

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Order of the task list. Posible values are 'asc' and 'desc'.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Number of the page to view.

parameter.name: alias
parameter.description: Alias to list tasks. Posible values are 'all', 'starred', 'completed', 'created', 'responsible', 'duetoday', 'duethisweek', 'late', 'files', 'inprogress' and 'paused'

parameter.name: includeDeleted
parameter.description: Boolean value to list tasks with deleted task. Default value is false.

parameter.name: networksCriteria
parameter.description: An array of network IDs to search by network criteria.

parameter.name: projectsCriteria
parameter.description: An array of project IDs to search by project criteria.

parameter.name: prioritiesCriteria
parameter.description: An array of priority IDs to search by priority criteria.

parameter.name: statusesCriteria
parameter.description: An array of task status IDs to search by task status criteria.

parameter.name: responsiblesCriteria
parameter.description: An array of user IDs to search by task responsibles criteria.

parameter.name: followersCriteria
parameter.description: An array of user IDs to search by task followers criteria.

parameter.name: creatorsCriteria
parameter.description: An array of user IDs to search by task creators criteria.

parameter.name: labelsCriteria
parameter.description: An array of label IDs to search by task labels criteria.

parameter.name: searchTextCriteria
parameter.description: Text string to search tasks.

parameter.name: deadlineFromCriteria
parameter.description: Deadline from date. The date should be in epoch format.

parameter.name: deadlineToCriteria
parameter.description: Task deadline to date. The date should be in epoch format.

parameter.name: createdAtFromCriteria
parameter.description: Task created at 'from' date. The date should be in epoch format.

parameter.name: createdAtToCriteria
parameter.description: Task created at 'to' date. The date should be in epoch format.

parameter.name: updatedAtFromCriteria
parameter.description: Task updated at 'from' date. The date should be in epoch format.

parameter.name: updatedAtToCriteria
parameter.description: Task updated at 'to' date. The date should be in epoch format.
